org.springframework.social.vkontakte.api

Interface UsersOperations


  • public interface UsersOperations
    User operations.
    Author:
    vkolodrevskiy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VKontakteProfile getProfile()
      Retrieves the profile for the authenticated user.
      java.util.List<VKontakteProfile> getProfiles(java.util.List<java.lang.String> userIds)
      Retrieves profiles for specified user unique identifiers.

    • Method Detail

      • getProfile

        VKontakteProfile getProfile()
        Retrieves the profile for the authenticated user.
        Returns:
        the user's profile information.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.social.ApiException - if there is an error while communicating with VKontakte.
        org.springframework.social.MissingAuthorizationException - if VKontakteTemplate was not created with an access token.
        VKontakteErrorException - if VKontakte returned error.

      • getProfiles

        java.util.List<VKontakteProfile> getProfiles(java.util.List<java.lang.String> userIds)
        Retrieves profiles for specified user unique identifiers.
        Parameters:
        userIds - VKontakte user profile unique identifiers, for which to gt data. If null is passed user profile or the current user will be returned.
        Returns:
        the user's profile information.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.social.ApiException - if there is an error while communicating with VKontakte.
        org.springframework.social.MissingAuthorizationException - if VKontakteTemplate was not created with an access token.
        VKontakteErrorException - if VKontakte returned error.
